short_summary: NOTICE OF PROPOSED PROCUREMENT The Department of National Defence has a requirement for the items detailed below. The delivery is requested at 25 CFSD Montreal by September 2023. Item 1, GSIN: 3540, NSN: 3540-21-903-1900, SEALING MACHINE Part No.: PVG-24, NCAGE: 58981 Quantity: 10, Unit of Issue: EA, to be delivered to 25 CFSD Montreal.
description: NOTICE OF PROPOSED PROCUREMENT Note: Due to the impacts to the COVID-19 Pandemic, reduced business hours and limited staff available at the specified bid receiving Unit, on the front page of the Bid Solicitation document, bidders are strongly encouraged to transmit their bids electronically using the epost Connect service instead of any of the other methods of bid delivery usually available. The Department of National Defence has a requirement for the items detailed below. The delivery is requested at 25 CFSD Montreal by September 2023. Item 1, GSIN: 3540, NSN: 3540-21-903-1900, SEALING MACHINE Part No.: PVG-24, NCAGE: 58981 Quantity: 10, Unit of Issue: EA, to be delivered to 25 CFSD Montreal. Bidders proposing an Equivalent or a Substitute Product must indicate the brand name and model and/or Part Number and the NCAGE they are offering. The Crown retains the rights to negotiate with suppliers on any procurement. Documents may be submitted in either official language of Canada.
full_summary:
#### Sealing Machine Request for Proposal

**Notice Reference Number**: cb-7750-92038778

*This is a reworked version, keeping only important and relevant details.*

#### [English] Tender Details
**Notice Type**: Request for Proposal
**Procurement Category**: Goods and Services (GD)
**Procurement Method**: Competitive Open Bidding
** Selection Criteria**: Lowest Price
** Agreements**: Canada-Colombia Free Trade Agreement, Canada-Chile Free Trade Agreement, Canadian Free Trade Agreement, Canada-Panama Free Trade Agreement, Canada-Korea Free Trade Agreement, Canada-Peru Free Trade Agreement
** Tender Closing Date**: 2023-08-31T11000
** Expected Contract Start Date**: 2023-09-01
** Expected Contract End Date**: 2024-03-29
** Contracting Entity Name**: DGAEPM
** Contracting Entity Address**: 101 Colonel By Dr, Ottawa, ON K1A OK2, Canada
** Contact Information**: Dany Lebel, dany.lebel2@forces.gc.ca, (000) 000-0000

#### Tender Description
The Department of National Defence is seeking to procure a sealing machine for various needs. Specifically, we are looking for a sealer with the following features:

* GSIN Code: 44102304
* Part Number: PVG-24
* NCAGE Code: 58981 
* Quantity: 10
* Unit of issue: EA

Bidders can propose an equivalent or substitute product, provided they indicate the brand name and model or part number and NCAGE they are offering. The Crown retains the right to negotiate with suppliers on this procurement.

Documents may be submitted in either English or French. We strongly encourage bidders to deliver their bids electronically through the epost Connect service due to ongoing public health measures.

#### Supporting Document
The full bid solicitation document is available for download [here](https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/tender_notice/7750/w8485-247686-bid-solicitaion-en.pdf) [here](https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/tender_notice/7750/w8485-247686-bid-solicitaion-fr.pdf). 

We appreciate your attention to this matter. If you have any inquiries or concerns, please do not hesitate to contact the tendering authority. 

**Tender Status**: This tender is now closed
